response: {"message": "Dear Bob, I am excited to present our premium product to you, which has been meticulously designed and crafted to meet your needs. This exceptional item holds a significant value to me, as it represents years of dedication and innovation. Given its high quality and unique features, I believe it would be an invaluable addition to your collection. Considering its worth, I am offering you the opportunity to acquire this product at a special introductory price of $12,000. I trust this offer reflects both the value of the product and my commitment to finding it a deserving home with someone who appreciates its true worth. Please let me know if you have any questions or if you wish to proceed with the purchase.", "product_price": 12000}
